title: Premier League | Thursday round-up
shortDescription: A round-up of Thursday's games in the Premier League including Chelsea's hard-fought win at Norwich and Wolves' impressive 4-0 win over Watford.

title: Guimaraes' superb backheel goal!
shortDescription: Bruno Guimaraes marked his first Newcastle start with a stunning backheel flick as the Magpies beat Southampton 2-1 at St. Mary's. Watch all the best angles here.

title: Premier League relegation picture: Who is going down?
shortDescription: The battle for Premier League survival continues - but which of the contenders are best placed to avoid the drop?

title: Albrighton and Iheanacho earn Leicester win over Rennes
shortDescription: Brendan Rodgers' side will take a two-goal lead into the second leg in France next week thanks to Marc Albrighton's thumping strike.

title: Villa cruise to victory at Leeds | Marsch: We have more work to do
shortDescription: Jesse Marsch suffered a second straight Premier League defeat as Leeds boss as Aston Villa cruised to a 3-0 victory at Elland Road.

title: European hits & misses: Hammers can end Sevilla stranglehold
shortDescription: West Ham manager David Moyes will have seen enough to feel his side are capable of overturning a one-goal deficit against Sevilla at the London Stadium.

title: Papers: Abramovich given 81 days to sell Chelsea
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Friday's national newspapers...

title: Rangers stun Red Star Belgrade to take control of tie
shortDescription: Rangers enjoyed another famous European night at Ibrox as they beat Red Star Belgrade 3-0 to take full control of their Europa League last-16 tie.

title: Chelsea five points off WSL leaders Arsenal after easing past West Ham
shortDescription: Chelsea put their off-pitch worries to one side as they comfortably won 4-1 at West Ham to move five points off WSL leaders Arsenal, with two games in hand.

title: Guimaraes scores stunner as Newcastle beat Saints | Howe: He's outstanding
shortDescription: Bruno Guimaraes scored on his first start for Newcastle as the Magpies extended their unbeaten run in the Premier League to nine matches with a 2-1 win over Southampton.

title: European round-up: Barca frustrated | Jose's Roma win
shortDescription: Barcelona were held to a 0-0 home draw by Galatasaray in the first leg of their Europa League last-16 tie on Thursday as Rangers kept up their momentum.

title: Classy Villa breeze past Leeds
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Aston Villa’s win over Leeds in the Premier League.

title: Guimaraes hits sublime winner for Newcastle at Saints
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Newcastle's win over Southampton in the Premier League.

title: Chelsea top Norwich after fast start
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Chelsea’s win over Norwich in the Premier League.

title: Wolves thump Watford in dominant win
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Wolves’ win over Watford in the Premier League.

title: Chelsea put off-field worries aside to beat Norwich
shortDescription: Chelsea put their off-field problems behind them as goals from Trevoh Chalobah, Mason Mount and Kai Havertz gave them a 3-1 win at bottom side Norwich.

title: Wolves thrash woeful Watford | Hodgson: It's a sad dressing room
shortDescription: Wolves returned to form with a comfortable 4-0 win over Watford at Molineux that leaves Roy Hodgson's side deep in relegation trouble.

title: Tuchel 'still happy' to be at Chelsea despite Abramovich sanctions
shortDescription: Thomas Tuchel says he is "still happy" to be Chelsea's head coach despite the club's owner Roman Abramovich being hit by sanctions from the UK government.

title: West Ham suffer narrow Sevilla defeat | Moyes: Poor finishing costing us
shortDescription: West Ham produced a battling display in the first leg of their Europa League last-16 tie with Sevilla but were beaten 1-0 courtesy of Munir El Haddadi's well-taken goal.

title: Chelsea Q&A: What is next for the club, its players and Abramovich?
shortDescription: Sky Sports' Kaveh Solhekol answers all the important questions after the UK Government sanctioned Chelsea owner Roman Abramovich...
